data.text:
New York: Twayne Publishers Inc., 1953. First edition, first printing. Hardcover. Item #29863

From the library of Winona McClintic with her signature on the front and rear paste-down endpapers. McClintic was the author of science fiction short stories and poetry which appeared in "Best Of" collections and sf magazines. Very good in good to very good dust jacket with two one inch deep chips to the spine panel ends.
